``` {}
# Parse the Markdown into Mermaid flowchart
def parse_bullets_to_mermaid(md_text):
    lines = md_text.strip().splitlines()
    stack = []
    mermaid_lines = ["flowchart TD"]
    node_counter = 0
    node_ids = {}

    def get_node_id(text):
        nonlocal node_counter
        if text not in node_ids:
            node_ids[text] = f"N{node_counter}"
            node_counter += 1
        return node_ids[text]

    for line in lines:
        if not line.strip().startswith("-"):
            continue
        indent_level = len(line) - len(line.lstrip(" "))
        text = line.strip()[2:].strip()
        current_id = get_node_id(text)
        mermaid_lines.append(f'{current_id}["{text}"]')
        if stack and indent_level > stack[-1][0]:
            parent_id = stack[-1][1]
            mermaid_lines.append(f"{parent_id} --> {current_id}")
        elif stack and indent_level == stack[-1][0]:
            if len(stack) > 1:
                parent_id = stack[-2][1]
                mermaid_lines.append(f"{parent_id} --> {current_id}")
        stack = stack[:indent_level // 2]
        stack.append((indent_level, current_id))

    return "\n".join(mermaid_lines)

mermaid_code = parse_bullets_to_mermaid(md_text)
print(mermaid_code)
```
